title: Person of Interest - Finch teaches the machine chess pt.1
author: Katherine Breed
comment: Best episode ever! And perfectly written!!!!! Great job guys!!!!

thanks so much for uploading this, Katherine. Great Series! I'm a chess master and chess coach for kids. so I'm always intrigued how chess scenes are depicted on TV (films, series). I really liked Finch's character, the fact that he knows and teaches chess is adding to that.

Its wrong dudes, in each move you loose possibility to have different game. Tho most possibility you have in this game when you just one deciding its first decision.
Okay i just understood it wrongly.
description: Part 1 of the three chess scenes in which Finch teaches the machine chess throughout episode 1x11 'If-Then-Else'.
